value_claims.claim_title: Low AI agent production deployment rate reveals scaling challenges
value_claims.claim_description: Only 11% of organizations have successfully deployed AI agents in production, indicating significant barriers in moving from experimentation to operational deployment.
value_claims.source_quote: only 11% have successfully deployed these systems in production
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The metric directly measures AI agent deployment success rates across organizations

value_claims.claim_title: Majority of GenAI experiments face scaling limitations
value_claims.claim_description: More than two-thirds of organizations report that 30% or fewer of their GenAI experiments will be fully scaled in the next 3-6 months, revealing organizational change constraints.
value_claims.source_quote: More than two-thirds of respondents say that 30% or fewer of their experiments will be fully scaled in the next three to six months
value_claims.quote_location: Adoption is moving at the speed of business section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Metric directly measures GenAI experiment scaling rates and organizational adoption velocity

value_claims.claim_title: Regulatory compliance concerns increase as top GenAI barrier
value_claims.claim_description: Regulatory compliance concerns increased 10 percentage points from 28% to 38% as the top barrier to GenAI development and deployment.
value_claims.source_quote: Concerns around regulatory compliance has emerged as the top barrier holding organizations back from developing and deploying GenAI tools and applications – increasing 10 percentage points from the Wave 1 survey (28%) to Wave 4 (38%)
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Metric measures barriers to AI adoption rather than direct value creation

value_claims.claim_title: IT function leads in advanced GenAI implementation
value_claims.claim_description: 28% of organizations report their most advanced GenAI initiative is in the IT function, indicating IT as the leading area for GenAI maturity.
value_claims.source_quote: GenAI usage in IT appears to be furthest along, with 28% saying their most advanced initiative is in that function
value_claims.quote_location: Scaling is still a work in progress section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Metric directly measures GenAI implementation maturity by functional area

value_claims.claim_title: Cybersecurity GenAI implementations exceed ROI expectations
value_claims.claim_description: 44% of organizations report that cybersecurity GenAI implementations have ROI that surpassed expectations, the highest of any function.
value_claims.source_quote: Cybersecurity implementations have also emerged as a standout, with 44% saying ROI has surpassed their expectations, more than any other function
value_claims.quote_location: Scaling is still a work in progress section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Metric directly measures ROI performance of GenAI in cybersecurity relative to expectations

value_claims.claim_description: 26% of organizations are exploring autonomous agent development to a large extent, with an additional 42% exploring to some extent, totaling 68% engagement.
value_claims.source_quote: 26% of surveyed organizations already exploring autonomous agent development to a large extent and 42% to some extent
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Metric directly measures organizational engagement with agentic AI development

value_claims.claim_description: 69% of organizations indicate that fully implementing a GenAI governance strategy will take over a year to resolve.
value_claims.source_quote: Sixty-nine percent of respondents say fully implementing a governance strategy will take over a year to resolve
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Metric measures governance implementation timeline, a prerequisite for AI value but not direct value creation

context_claims.claim_title: Deloitte serves Fortune 500 and private companies globally
context_claims.claim_description: Deloitte provides services to nearly 90% of Fortune 500 companies and more than 8,500 U.S.-based private companies
context_claims.source_quote: Deloitte provides industry-leading audit, consulting, tax and advisory services to many of the world's most admired brands, including nearly 90% of the Fortune 500® and more than 8,500 U.S.-based private companies

context_claims.claim_title: Deloitte operates as global professional services network
context_claims.claim_description: Deloitte network spans more than 150 countries and territories with approximately 470,000 people worldwide
context_claims.source_quote: our network of member firms spans more than 150 countries and territories. Learn how Deloitte's approximately 470,000 people worldwide connect for impact

context_claims.claim_title: Tech Trends report published annually for 17 years
context_claims.claim_description: Deloitte has tracked emerging technologies through Tech Trends report for 17 years as of 2026
context_claims.source_quote: For 17 years, 'Tech Trends' has tracked emerging technologies poised to reshape business

context_claims.claim_title: Tech Trends 2026 forecasts 18-24 month technology impact
context_claims.claim_description: The Tech Trends 2026 report provides clarity on business impact expected over the next 18 to 24 months
context_claims.source_quote: provide clarity and confidence about the business and mission impact expected over the next 18 to 24 months

context_claims.claim_title: Deloitte launched Human Capital AI solution suite in June 2025
context_claims.claim_description: Deloitte announced Workforce Analyzer and Workforce Planner+ as part of Human Capital AI solution suite on June 24, 2025
context_claims.source_quote: NEW YORK, June 24, 2025 — Deloitte announced the launch of its Human Capital AI solution suite, featuring Workforce Analyzer and Workforce Planner+

context_claims.claim_title: Workforce planning and strategic deployment capabilities
context_claims.claim_description: Workforce Planner+ provides AI-driven workforce planning with real-time insights for role requirements, costs and talent sourcing
context_claims.source_quote: Workforce Planner+ is an AI-driven solution designed to simplify workforce planning and strategic deployment. Modeling scenarios from numerous projects provides real-time insights that facilitate rapid assessment of role requirements, costs and talent sourcing

context_claims.claim_title: AI impact assessment on workforce dynamics
context_claims.claim_description: Workforce Analyzer examines AI impact on workforce dynamics to improve productivity, manage costs and encourage innovation
context_claims.source_quote: Workforce Analyzer uses Generative AI to assist in workforce management and operational efficiency. This solution examines the impact of AI on workforce dynamics, helping organizations improve productivity, manage costs and encourage innovation

context_claims.claim_title: HR AI maturity model and workflow library launched
context_claims.claim_description: Deloitte provides HR AI Maturity Model, Diagnostic and Agentic AI Workflow Library with 300+ reimagined HR workflows
context_claims.source_quote: HR AI Maturity Model, Diagnostic and Agentic AI Workflow Library provides a comprehensive toolkit to help accelerate the AI journey for HR... The agentic AI workflow library provides 300+ HR workflows reimagined based on the latest reasoning

context_claims.claim_title: State of GenAI report fourth quarterly edition published January 2025
context_claims.claim_description: Deloitte AI Institute published fourth quarterly State of Generative AI in the Enterprise report in January 2025
context_claims.source_quote: DAVOS, Switzerland, Jan. 21, 2025... The Deloitte AI Institute™ today unveiled the fourth quarterly edition of its State of Generative AI in the Enterprise report

context_claims.claim_title: GenAI survey covers 2,773 leaders across 14 countries
context_claims.claim_description: Survey conducted July-September 2024 with 2,773 director- to C-suite-level respondents across 14 countries and six industries
context_claims.source_quote: based on a survey of 2,773 director- to C-suite-level respondents across 14 countries... This wave of the survey, conducted between July and September 2024, connected with 2,773 AI-savvy business and technology leaders

context_claims.claim_title: GenAI research covers six major industry sectors
context_claims.claim_description: Survey covers consumer; energy, resources and industrials; financial services; life sciences and health care; technology, media and telecom; and government sectors
context_claims.source_quote: major organizations across 14 countries and six industries: consumer; energy, resources and industrials; financial services; life sciences and health care; technology, media and telecom; and government and public services

context_claims.claim_title: Focus on bridging experimentation to impact gap
context_claims.claim_description: Deloitte emphasizes that the gap between experimentation and impact is where competitive advantage is won or lost
context_claims.source_quote: Ultimately, the gap between experimentation and impact is where competitive advantage is won or lost. Those who bridge it now are better positioned to shape their industries

context_claims.claim_title: Deloitte has 180 years of service history
context_claims.claim_description: Deloitte organization has been providing services for 180 years
context_claims.source_quote: Bringing 180 years of service, our network of member firms spans more than 150 countries and territories

context_claims.claim_title: Strategic alliances with leading technology companies
context_claims.claim_description: Deloitte has established strategic alliances with leading technology companies to deliver AI and data offerings
context_claims.source_quote: Deloitte has established strategic alliances with leading technology companies to deliver innovative, agile, differentiated, and market-first offerings with AI and data

context_claims.claim_title: Partnership with Salesforce on workforce transformation
context_claims.claim_description: Deloitte collaborates with Salesforce to provide workforce insights using skills data for AI implementation
context_claims.source_quote: Deloitte's Workforce Analyzer, combined with robust skills data, gives organizations a deep understanding of AI's impact on their talent, helping them make more informed decisions and optimize their workforce during this transformation. - Ruth Hickin, VP, Workforce Innovation and Transformation, Salesforce
